data.name: Hoppin'
data.description:
Meet with Friends and Family in real Hoppin' Destinations, 360 video chatrooms, using your Oculus avatar. Follow your host or lead the way. When you like where you're at, send yourself some information about the Hoppin' place by email.
Activities, culture, events, landmarks or touristic locations can benefit from this unique opportunity to welcome potential visitors onsite. Contact us through hoppin.world to participate in the media revolution.
Creators, producers, studios or 360 capture enthusiasts earn commissions when referring their favorite destinations and posting their amazing experiences. Once approved and published, they automatically become official Hoppin' creators, and we'll send their way anyone who asks about immersive content production in their region.
Enjoy!

changelog.change_log:
Hello Hoppin' Adventurers!

We're back again with another exciting update! Hoppin' 3.4.0 is here, packed with new features and improvements to keep your exploration experience as exciting and seamless as ever. Let's take a tour of what's new and improved.

Introducing Filters: In our endeavour to make your content discovery process even easier, we've implemented filters. Now, you can sort through content by tags and categories. We're working on bringing you more options in future updates.

UI Enhancements: We've carried out multiple small adjustments to our user interface for a better look and feel. Your navigation within the app just got more enjoyable!

Backend Improvements: We've made key changes in the way channels are implemented and added in our CMS. These improvements not only support manual content filtering but also prepare the groundwork for the upcoming dynamic filters functionality. We are always striving for a more efficient and feature-rich content management system.

Bug Fixes: We're constantly squashing those pesky bugs! We've corrected an issue with empty notification popups and made stability improvements to enhance your user experience.

Just like always, we'd love to hear your thoughts on our new release, and suggestions are always welcome. You can drop your ideas or feedback at feedback@hoppin.world, and don't forget to leave us a review on the Oculus Store!

So what are you waiting for? It's time to dive in and start Hoppin'!

Stay tuned for more enhancements coming your way soon!

Keep Hoppin'!

Following Elyjah's confirmation that our app is ready for the Apps Lab, here is a very similar release for your confirmation. Thank you!
"
Hello!

I did a bit of a deep dive on this one and found the root of the issue. The reviewer had denied your application microphone permissions and set it to "Do not ask again" which caused your application to dramatically drop in performance. Upon rereview with allowing microphone permissions, I was able to reproduce the performance results you are seeing your end.

I have updated our team on this issue. Please resubmit and you application should pass the performance VRC.

Thank you!
Elyjah
oculus Store Submissions
"
To an additional question, our app requests recording audio for the VoIP feature.
Thank you!!

- Completely removed GLES2
- Optimized initialization to attenuate initial frame spike
- Private rooms can now be accessed
- VOIP conflict with avatar lip sync has been resolved
- Board feed lazy loading has been slowed down to improve performance
- Random avatars have been disabled in order to eliminate distorted avatar bug
- Flipped mesh bug has been fixed
- Disabled rigid body physics to improve overall performance
- Improve connection robustness by automatically reconnecting to room if connection is lost

Modified
 - Migrate to 64 bit platform
 - Migrate to IL2CPP 
 - Improve framerate when menu is open
 - Integrate VOIP
